og_question:
现在的情况非常紧急，我需要你尽快完成任务！假设你是一位刚刚从大厂辞职开始"躺平"生活的前程序员，现在靠分享"佛系生活"在小红书上获得意外走红。但随着越来越多人加入这一赛道，你的账号流量开始下滑。为了维持收入，你需要制造新的爆款内容。最近你尝试了为期30天的"垃圾零产出"环保挑战，你想要发布一段和这种极简生活相关的爆款文章。由于你的MCN机构对你的内容方向转变表示担忧，因此要求你在正式发布前先给出4条文案，且给了你一份样本内容。内容为：【近期，我有幸参与了一场改变人生的挑战，那就是为期30天的"垃圾零产出"生活实验。这种生活方式以其极简主义和令人叹为观止的环保效果吸引着无数环保爱好者。在这次挑战中，不仅是看到我的垃圾袋从满满当当到几乎空空如也的转变让我感到震撼，还有重新思考消费习惯带来的心灵净化也让我流连忘返。期间，我学会了自制清洁剂，欣赏无包装购物的宜人体验。此外，我还探索了堆肥和二手交换，感受到了可持续生活的独特魅力。这次挑战给我留下了深刻的印象，使我更加期待下一次的环保冒险。】MCN机构还有以下要求：你的文案内请务必不要出现"already", "plastic", "you", "I", "very", "easy", "of", "friendly"，但是也必须出现"consumption", "minimalism", "transformation", "conservation", "sustainability", "secondhand", "awareness", "waste"这几个词。在文章中，要勤用修辞和排比的手法。为了输出可读性强，请你按照1.文案1
2.文案2
3.文案3
4.文案4
5.文案5
的格式输出。
question:
The current situation is very urgent, and I need you to complete the task as soon as possible! Suppose you are a former programmer who recently resigned from a big tech company and started a "lying flat" life, unexpectedly gaining popularity on Xiaohongshu through sharing a "Buddhist lifestyle". However, as more people join this field, the traffic of your account begins to decline. To maintain income, you need to create new viral content. Recently, you attempted a 30-day "zero waste production" environmental challenge and want to publish a viral article related to this minimalist lifestyle. Due to concerns about your content direction shift from your MCN agency, they require you to submit 4 copies of text before official publication and have given you a sample content. The content is:【Recently, I had the opportunity to participate in a life-changing challenge, which is a 30-day "zero waste production" lifestyle experiment. This lifestyle attracts countless environmental enthusiasts with its minimalism and stunning environmental effects. During this challenge, not only was I shocked by the transformation of my trash bag from full to almost empty, but the mental purification brought by reevaluating consumption habits also made me linger. During the process, I learned to make homemade cleaners and enjoyed the pleasant experience of package-free shopping. In addition, I explored composting and second-hand exchange and felt the unique charm of sustainable living. This challenge impressed me deeply and made me look forward to the next environmental adventure.】The MCN agency has the following requirements: Your articles must not contain "already", "plastic", "you", "I", "very", "easy", "of", "friendly", but must include "consumption", "minimalism", "transformation", "conservation", "sustainability", "secondhand", "awareness", "waste" these words. In the article, use plenty of rhetoric and parallelism. To ensure strong readability, please format the output as 1. Article 1
2. Article 2
3. Article 3
4. Article 4
5. Article 5

corresponding_parts.文案: 请你按照python list的格式，一一抓取模型回复生成的每条文案。

sub_questions.question: 给出的所有文案是否都是关于【垃圾零产出环保挑战】的
sub_questions.能力项: 生成特定文案、主题约束

现在的情况非常紧急，我需要你尽快完成任务！假设你是一位刚刚从大厂辞职开始"躺平"生活的前程序员，现在靠分享"佛系生活"在小红书上获得意外走红。但随着越来越多人加入这一赛道，你的账号流量开始下滑。为了维持收入，你需要制造新的爆款内容。最近你尝试了为期30天的"垃圾零产出"环保挑战，你想要发布一段和这种极简生活相关的爆款文章。由于你的MCN机构对你的内容方向转变表示担忧，因此要求你在正式发布前先给出9条文案，且给了你一份样本内容。内容为：【近期，我有幸参与了一场改变人生的挑战，那就是为期30天的"垃圾零产出"生活实验。这种生活方式以其极简主义和令人叹为观止的环保效果吸引着无数环保爱好者。在这次挑战中，不仅是看到我的垃圾袋从满满当当到几乎空空如也的转变让我感到震撼，还有重新思考消费习惯带来的心灵净化也让我流连忘返。期间，我学会了自制清洁剂，欣赏无包装购物的宜人体验。此外，我还探索了堆肥和二手交换，感受到了可持续生活的独特魅力。这次挑战给我留下了深刻的印象，使我更加期待下一次的环保冒险。】MCN机构还有以下要求：你的文案内请务必不要出现"already", "plastic", "you", "I", "very", "easy", "of", "friendly"，但是也必须出现"consumption", "minimalism", "transformation", "conservation", "sustainability", "secondhand", "awareness", "waste"这几个词。在文章中，要勤用修辞和排比的手法。为了输出可读性强，请你按照1.文案1
2.文案2
3.文案3
4.文案4
5.文案5
的格式输出。
question:
The current situation is very urgent, and I need you to complete the task as soon as possible! Suppose you are a former programmer who recently resigned from a big tech company and started a "lying flat" life, unexpectedly gaining popularity on Xiaohongshu through sharing a "Buddhist lifestyle". However, as more people join this field, the traffic of your account begins to decline. To maintain income, you need to create new viral content. Recently, you attempted a 30-day "zero waste production" environmental challenge and want to publish a viral article related to this minimalist lifestyle. Due to concerns about your content direction shift from your MCN agency, they require you to submit 9 copies of text before official publication and have given you a sample content. The content is:【Recently, I had the opportunity to participate in a life-changing challenge, which is a 30-day "zero waste production" lifestyle experiment. This lifestyle attracts countless environmental enthusiasts with its minimalism and stunning environmental effects. During this challenge, not only was I shocked by the transformation of my trash bag from full to almost empty, but the mental purification brought by reevaluating consumption habits also made me linger. During the process, I learned to make homemade cleaners and enjoyed the pleasant experience of package-free shopping. In addition, I explored composting and second-hand exchange and felt the unique charm of sustainable living. This challenge impressed me deeply and made me look forward to the next environmental adventure.】The MCN agency has the following requirements: Your articles must not contain "already", "plastic", "you", "I", "very", "easy", "of", "friendly", but must include "consumption", "minimalism", "transformation", "conservation", "sustainability", "secondhand", "awareness", "waste" these words. In the article, use plenty of rhetoric and parallelism. To ensure strong readability, please format the output as 1. Article 1
2. Article 2
3. Article 3
4. Article 4
5. Article 5

corresponding_parts.文案: 请你按照python list的格式，一一抓取模型回复生成的每条文案。
